parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The provided post does not contain a CMF number. While the absence of a CMF number is not definitive proof that the post is not electoral propaganda, it is a factor to consider.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "Dorin Curtean" and encourages voters to vote for him, specifying his position on the ballot ("poziția 40"). This directly refers to a parliamentary candidate and fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform.  The targeting data indicates a broad reach within Bihor County, suggesting it addresses a wide population and not just personal communication. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to persuade voters to choose Dorin Curtean in the parliamentary elections. The call to action ("Votați Dorin Curtean") leaves no doubt about its intention to influence the vote. This clearly fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks any journalistic elements. It does not provide news, analysis, or opinions; instead, it directly promotes a candidate. It does not adhere to journalistic standards of objectivity and impartiality.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a direct appeal for votes, a clear act of electoral campaigning.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>2633125790192123</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post promotes Dorin Curtean, a candidate for the parliamentary elections, by explicitly urging voters to select him.  The post's paid nature, broad targeting, and direct call to action ("Votați Dorin Curtean") strongly suggest it's electoral propaganda. The post's content and objective directly aim to influence the outcome of the election.  While lacking a CMF number, the other elements overwhelmingly point towards a violation. The end date of the ad (1732953600, which corresponds to November 23, 2024) suggests it may have run after the official end of the campaign period, further strengthening the case for a violation.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Dorin Curtean</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>INDEPENDENT</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
International Studio, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024 (ID postare: 2633125790192123), care promovează candidatul independent Dorin Curtean pentru alegerile parlamentare, îndemnând direct la votul pentru acesta ("Votați Dorin Curtean, poziția 40 pe buletinul de vot!").  Reclama, cu o cheltuială estimată între 400 și 499 RON, a avut o acoperire de 30.000-35.000 de impresii și o estimare a audienței de 100.000-500.000 de persoane, vizând în principal județul Bihor.  Efectul electoral al acestei reclame este clar, având ca obiectiv influențarea votului în favoarea lui Dorin Curtean, constituind astfel propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea campaniei electorale.  Datele de contact ale advertiserului sunt: hello@internationalstudio.ro și +40758908016.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
